item.title: Pc
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:6, topic:437924”][quote author=rhys132 link=topic=540640.msg3959635#msg3959635 date=1333149161]

Highlight it. Delete it. Type in what you want. Save. Compile.

its not dialogue handler its in action handlers,

get the npc id go to actionhandler.java do ctrl+f type in the npc id and keep going untill you find something like this

case 1599:
ScriptManager.callFunc(“npcClick3_”+npcType, c, npcType);
c.getShops().openShop(48);
c.sendMessage(“You have " + c.magePoints + " Slayer points.”);
break;
}
}
[/quote]

Why are his dialogues loading from the ActionHandler…?[/quote]
erm i think thats what he asked for im not sure, but this isnt a dialogue, when you click on the npc it opens the shop and then says how many points you have

Read full topic
